name: Bosk Tales
description:
A girl and a dragon become unusual friends and set off on a journey together, solving puzzles through a forest

Features:

  • Magic
  • Dragons
  • Fantasy
  • Adventure
  • Puzzles

This game came about due to a school group project in IPLeiria, this project was created by 3 people with the purpose to develop a fun and creative game.

Team Credits:

Game Artist - Duarte "Kin" Pereira

Game Programmer: Gabriel Andrade

Game Designer: Nuno Cardoso

If you enjoyed "Bosk Tales" make sure to visit our social media:

https://twitter.com/TeamBlueLocket

https://www.indiedb.com/games/bosk-tales2

Thank you to everyone who supported this game during its development
